etymology.type: simplified: homophonic character (derived from 乂); traditional: phono-semantic compound
etymology.description: trad 義: semantic 羊 ('good; auspicious') + phonetic 我; simp 义: derived from 乂 (homophony), later marked with an added top stroke to distinguish from 刈.
etymology.interpretation: In traditional form, 義 combines the auspicious sense of 羊 with the sound of 我 to convey the moral idea of rightness. The simplified 义 adopted a homophonic graph from 乂 and was tweaked with an extra stroke to avoid confusion with 刈, becoming the standard simplified form.
etymology.simplification: Adopted a homophonic, graphically simpler form from 乂 with a distinguishing top stroke, replacing complex 義.

examples.chinese: 我们追求正义(我們追求正義)。
他履行公民义务(他履行公民義務)。
这个词的意义很清楚(這個詞的意義很清楚)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège cí de yìyì hěn qīngchǔ.
examples.english: The meaning of this word is very clear.
